product.name: Archify Platform
product.description: A modern educational platform for ISCAE students providing access to exam solutions, video tutorials, and study materials
product.targetAudience: ISCAE students in Informatique de Gestion program

requirements.title: Navigation System
requirements.description: The platform must have a clear, intuitive navigation system with proper ordering
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation order: Tableau de bord → Cours → Tarifs → Se connecter → S'inscrire
Dashboard redirects to home page when not authenticated

requirements.title: Authentication System
requirements.description: Users must be able to register and login securely
acceptanceCriteria: Registration form with all required fields
Auth component detects login vs register mode
Proper form validation and error handling

requirements.title: Home Page Design
requirements.description: The home page must be engaging and informative
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section with gradient text animation
Featured courses section with hover effects
Pricing section with links to subscription page

requirements.title: Subscription Management
requirements.description: Users must be able to view and select subscription plans
acceptanceCriteria: Three subscription plans displayed: Vidéos (650 MRU), Documents (500 MRU), Full Access (1000 MRU)
Payment provider logos display correctly (Bankily, Masrivi, Sedad)

requirements.title: UI/UX Design
requirements.description: The platform must have modern, professional design

requirements.title: Responsive Design
requirements.description: The platform must work on all device sizes

requirements.title: Performance
requirements.description: The platform must load quickly and perform well

requirements.title: Accessibility
requirements.description: The platform must be accessible to all users
